comment: Lemma for ~ mapdpg . Baer p. 45, lines 1 and 2: "we have (F(x-y))* = Gt where t necessarily belongs to (Fx)*+(Fy)*." (We scope $d ` t ph ` locally to avoid clashes with later substitutions into ` ph ` .) (Contributed by NM, 15-Mar-2015.)
